chain chain-space - chain space st -stitch treble_crochet - treble_crochet u k double_crochet u s fptr - front post treble_crochet u k front post double_crochet u s bptr - back post treble_crochet u k back post double_crochet u s this pattern is written in both u k and u s terms i have also made this scarf using 4 skeins from bird street yarns you will find my notes on this at the end of the pattern pattern to start chain 88 1 1tr double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hook *1 treble_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 5ch treble_crochet double_crochet 3tog over the next 3ch 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 5ch 1tr double_crochet ch1 1tr double_crochet in the next chain* repeat from * to * 5 times at the end of the 5th repeat make 2tr double_crochet turn 2 ch3 this counts as your first treble_crochet double_crochet 1tr double_crochet in the same st 1tr double_crochet in each of the nexts 5 sts *miss the next st bptr bpdc around the 3tr double_crochet decrease below miss the next st 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts bptr bpdc around the next st make 1tr double_crochet ch1 1tr double_crochet in the next chain-space bptr bpdc around the next st 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times miss the next st bptr bpdc around the 3tr double_crochet decrease below miss the next st 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts end with 2tr double_crochet in the 3rd chain of the ch3 below turn 3 ch3 this counts as your first treble_crochet double_crochet make 1tr double_crochet in the same st make 1tr double_crochet in each of the nexts 5 sts * miss the next st fptr fpdc around the fptr fpdc below miss the next st 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts fptr fpdc around the next st make 1tr double_crochet ch1 1tr double_crochet in the next chain-space fptr fpdc around the next st 1tr double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts* repeat from * to * 4 times
